description:
Storytelling has become one of the most effective communication techniques of the moment.
Whether you are in charge of communication, marketing, business leaders, entrepreneurs, managers, project managers, education officers, this course is for you, and in general for any person brought to provide leadership.
Combining techniques from the methods of creativity and storytelling, this course gives you the tools to stimulate and strengthen the commitment of your employees and communicate effective and sustainable managerial posts in various contexts.
Prerequisites
None in particular, however, a basic understanding of the English language is recommended, to use all additional resources over.

                                            Syllabus
                        
VS rational thinking creative thinking
Foster creativity
Storytelling managers
Stimulate the imagination
The effects of storytelling
Inspiration: creative geniuses
title: Storytelling des managers
